name: Light and Life (IAPSOP)
content:
Light and Life (IAPSOP) About Archives Practices Contribute Contacts Search     Periodical: Light and Life Summary:  Light and Life. An Unsectarian Magazine of Mystic Literature. 1886 Monthly Glasgow, Scotland. Publisher: Light and Life. 1/1, marked “new series,” August 1886. 16 pp, 2s./issue, $1.00 to US. The journal contains occasional references to spiritualism and occultism (including regular notices of R.F. Fryar's offerings and articles by Thomas Moore Johnson, a Platonist and member of the H.B. of L.), but was devoted mainly to studies of Boehme, Pordage, Madame Guyon, et al., and to alchemy, Quakerism, etc. Hamilton College, Harvard, U of Glasgow. Issues:Light And Life NS N1 Aug 2 1886 Light And Life NS N2 Sep 4 1886 Light And Life NS N3 Oct 2 1886 Light And Life NS N4 Nov 1 1886 Light And Life NS N5 Dec 1 1886 Light And Life NS N6 Jan 1887
